tasks.task_description: Text Categorization by Topic is the task of assigning a sentence or document an appropriate category. The categories depend on the chosen dataset and can range from topics.

datasets.paper_title: The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Machine Learning in Moldavian versus Romanian Dialect Identification

tasks.task_description: Named entity recognition (NER) is the task of tagging entities in text with their corresponding type. Approaches typically use BIO notation, which differentiates the beginning (B) and the inside (I) of entities. O is used for non-entity tokens.

datasets.dataset_name: RONEC - Romanian Named Entity Corpus v1.0

tasks.task_description: Machine translation is the task of translating a sentence in a source language to a different target language

datasets.paper_title: Multilingual Denoising Pre-training for Neural Machine Translation

tasks.task_description: Tokenization is the process of breaking a stream of text up into words, phrases, symbols, or other meaningful elements called tokens. The list of tokens becomes input for further processing such as parsing or text mining.

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 - Tokenization
datasets.paper_title: NLP-Cube: End-to-End Raw Text Processing With Neural Networks

tasks.task_description: Sentence segmentation is the task of splitting a sentence into its component phrases.

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 - Sentence Segmentation
datasets.paper_title: NLP-Cube: End-to-End Raw Text Processing With Neural Networks

tasks.task_description: Lemmatization is the process of identifying the lemma of a given word or sequence of words.

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 - Lemmatization
datasets.paper_title: NLP-Cube: End-to-End Raw Text Processing With Neural Networks

tasks.task_description: Part-of-speech tagging (POS tagging) is the task of tagging a word in a text with its part of speech. A part of speech is a category of words with similar grammatical properties.

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 - Part of Speech Tagging
datasets.paper_title: NLP-Cube: End-to-End Raw Text Processing With Neural Networks

tasks.task_description: Dependency parsing is the task of extracting a dependency parse of a sentence that represents its grammatical structure and defines the relationships between "head" words and words, which modify those heads.

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 - Dependency Parsing
datasets.paper_title: NLP-Cube: End-to-End Raw Text Processing With Neural Networks

tasks.task_description: Language modeling is the task of predicting the next word or character in a document.

datasets.paper_title: LiRo: Benchmark and leaderboard for Romanian language tasks

tasks.task_description: Question Answering (QA) systems enable users to retrieve exact answers for questions posed in natural language. This task covers all QA systems for Romanian, with datasets that contain in-domain training data as well as zero-shot cross-linugal datasets.

datasets.paper_title: (results available online only, Romanian evaluated by DeepMind XQuAD dataset creators)

tasks.task_description: A sentiment analysis system combines natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques to assign weighted sentiment scores to the entities, topics, themes and/or categories within a phrase, sentence or document.

datasets.paper_title: Clustering Word Embeddings with Self-Organizing Maps. Application on LaRoSeDa -- A Large Romanian Sentiment Data Set

tasks.task_description: Semantic textual similarity deals with determining how similar two sentences or documents are. Similarity can be measured as an interval, like 1 (no relation between two texts) to 5 (the two texts fully convey the same meaning). Standard dataset measures include Pearson and Spearman correlations.
Part-of-speech tagging (POS tagging) is the task of tagging a word in a text with its part of speech. A part of speech is a category of words with similar grammatical properties.

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 – cross-domain PoS tagging
datasets.paper_title: LiRo: Benchmark and leaderboard for Romanian language tasks

datasets.dataset_name: UD Romanian RRT Treebank v2.5 – cross-domain Dependency Parsing
